title: Introduction to EOS Blockchain Platform
headline: Explore the EOS blockchain platform and its distinguishing features in this free online app development course.
description: EOS is one of the most popular blockchain platforms. It is worth exploring the EOS blockchain structure and technology to keep up with the current developments in cryptocurrency. This course offers a complete knowledge of EOS and explains its defining features and success elements.

courseDescription:
The era of smart contracts and cryptocurrency transactions is here to stay. Bitcoin was one of the first cryptocurrency platforms to be developed but several better platforms have since appeared. EOS Blockchain is one of the most refined blockchain technologies that specialises in smart contracts and cryptocurrency transactions. This course covers the fundamental concepts of EOS Blockchain’s technology so you can quickly begin creating your own smart contracts and cryptocurrencies using its features to create distributed blockchain-enabled applications. The first module begins with an overview of the course structure. We then proceed to address the concepts crucial to EOS Blockchain, which was developed to address the shortcomings of other blockchain networks. To gain widespread use, applications on the blockchain require a platform that is flexible enough to meet several requirements, which we discuss. The course then outlines the basics of blockchain, security and crypto-economics.

What do ‘accounts’ and ‘wallets’ mean in the context of EOS? The EOS ‘wallet’ may be viewed as a repository for the public-private key pairs needed to sign blockchain transactions in the EOS system. Unlike other cryptocurrencies, EOS has a distinct structure for accounts. Depending on the account, some operations may be handled on a ‘pass/fail’ basis without altering the internal state of the account. We examine ‘read-only’ action handlers, atomic transactions, the EOS testnet and the EOS toolset.

Over time, EOS apps have distinguished themselves as the quicker, cheaper and safer alternatives to conventional blockchain apps. According to the current trends, EOS has emerged as a real champion of blockchain technology and can offer enormous benefits for a variety of business demands in the future. This course provides the training you need to create your own cryptocurrency with the EOS Blockchain platform. This course has no prerequisites and suits both novice and veteran users of blockchain technology. Sign up to improve your cryptocurrency and app development skills with EOS Blockchain.
